name: SSHMUP - Simple SHMUP!
description:
This game was created because of the great tutorial series from Krystman (Lazy Dev Academy) and for his basic shump showcase.

It's my first game and finished program ever! I was only used to sequential scripts until now. I had a lot of fun and learned a lot on this ride! :) 

The game isn't really good and I could not implement every idea, but that's not the point. The way to finish this game somehow (unpolished) and the learnings on my way is what matters. And I'm thankful for that. I still have a lot to learn! I hope you can enjoy it a bit and I'm open for your feedback!

The game:

The controls will be shown in the game. 

The mission is to kill as many enemies as you can and reach the end of level 4 ;)

Special thanks to:

Krystman (Lazy Dev Academy) for the awesome tutorial series, the help in discord and the inspiration! I learned a lot from you :)

Gruber for the music and snippets I used from his "Pico-8 Tunes Vol. 2". Great work!
